mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no , prod_name , prod_detail , manufacture_day , price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.nextval , #{prodName} , #{prodDetail:VARCHAR} , to_char(to_date(#{manuDate:VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymmdd') , #{price:INTEGER} , #{fileName:VARCHAR} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no , prod_name , prod_detail , manufacture_day , price, image_file, reg_date FROM product WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.*, NVL(t.tran_status_code,'0') AS tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT p.*, NVL(t.tran_status_code,'0') AS tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND p.price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
) countTable
